dict.acceptation: 医学的；医药的；医疗的；内科的；

sent.orig: Irrational medical treatment includes profIt'seeking medical behaviors by medical professionals and defensive medical behaviors.
sent.trans: 高新医疗技术临床应用中的不合理诊疗行为，主要包括医方趋利性医疗行为和防御性医疗行为。

sent.orig: Two cores of medical insurance evaluation system were medical service quality and control medical expenditure.
sent.trans: 评价体系的建立必须围绕医疗服务质量和控制医疗费用这两个核心目标来进行。

sent.orig: It is compulsory and important for students in medical colleges to study medical molecular biology.
sent.trans: 医学分子生物学是医学院校学生必修的一门重要课程。

sent.orig: The complete medical facility treatment, outstanding doctor and the nurse complete medical examination system.
sent.trans: 齐全的医疗设施、秀的医师和护士、备的就诊体系。

sent.orig: Herbal and Botanical Products, Paper-Thermal, Pharmaceutical formulations, Medical Equipment, Medical, Diagnostic and Hospital Supplies.
sent.trans: 采购产品中草药和植物制品，纸品热，药剂配方，医疗设备，医疗，诊断及医院用品。
